item.title: Kodzi Kodi Addon [Installation Zip File From The Internet]
item.description:
What is the KODZI Kodi Add-on?

Kodzi is an add-on designed to assist in installing Kodi Repositories and add-ons. Kodzi is distinct because it tries to download any extension using any URL on the internet, provided that the zip file is on the website page and in a click-able format (is it even a word?). What I am referring to is that if you click the zip and it downloads to your computer, Kodzi will attempt the download process and then install

Kodzi Kodi Addon is an extremely useful tool for installing Kodi extensions and repositories directly via the internet.

Usually, when you want to install a third-party Kodi addon, you must add a source to your file manager and then download the zip file. But some Kodi addons can only be installed via GitHub or download an archive file.

Within Kodzi’s Kodzi Kodi Addon, you can input a URL to an unzip file or look on GitHub for extensions. This addon is very useful since you don’t have to download zip files and upload these files into the Kodi media center. Check out our screenshots to understand how it works.

Each time you come across a Kodi plugin or repository that isn’t accessible through other sources, you could consider using Kodzi.

Updating 2022: This extension is currently not compatible in conjunction with Kodi 19 Matrix. It’s unlikely it ever will.

Attention: Protect Your Privacy Online

Be aware that streaming videos may be prohibited in your specific country. Online privacy protection is becoming more essential. We suggest using the use of a VPN. A VPN safeguards your online activity and prevents your service provider and other authorities from scrutinizing your online activities.

Through the use of a VPN, you can also alter your address so that you can gain access to services not available at the place you reside.

We suggest using the most reliable Kodi VPN for 2024.

  • ProtonVPN: The most efficient way to increase your speed.
  • Access VPN for Privacy Access VPN: The best choice for those with a tight budget.
  • Surfshark VPN: Great for usability.
  • NordVPN: Best for average speeds.
  • CyberGhost VPN is the best VPN for a long trial period.

Koditricks.com is not associated with the creators of Kodi addons. We have no control over the contents of Kodi addons, nor do we recommend that our users take action against copyright violations.

Sections Overview

  • Enter Website URL
  • Enter Lists URL
  • Search GitHub
  • Search History
  • Installed Addons
  • System Settings

How do I install the Kodzi Kodi Addon?

Install The Kodz Repository

  1. You might need to allow the unknown source within your Kodi settings.
  2. You can go into your Kodi settings and then open the file manager.
  3. Choose “Add source” and click on “None.”
  4. Type in the path “https://mrkodz.github.io/repo/” and select “Done”
  5. Click on the box to highlight it and then type in initials like “MrKodz” for this media source
  6. Click “OK.”
  7. Return to the main menu and select “Addons” on the left.
  8. You can open the addon browser by clicking the little box icon at the top left
  9. Choose “Install from the ZIP file.”
  10. Open the source “MrKodz” and select the file repository.thekodz.zip
  11. You should wait until you see a notification that the repository was installed successfully.

If you’re unsure how to install the Kodi addon, look up our guide with screenshots.

Install Kodzi Kodi Addon

  1. In the browser for your addon, click “Install from repository.”
  2. Choose the available one, “The Kodz Repository.”
  3. Select the section “Program addons.”
  4. Choose Kodzi and then click “Install” on the bottom right
  5. KODI 18 ONLY Make sure you have confirmed the installation of dependencies by choosing “OK.”
  6. You should wait until you see a notification that indicates the Kodi addon was successfully installed.
  7. Return to the main menu, and the Kodi addon will be available.

Install a zip archive using Kodzi

  1. Begin your Kodzi Kodi extension and click “Enter Website URL.”
  2. Copy or paste the link to the zip file.
  3. Be sure that the link ends with “.zip” and points to the Kodi extension or repository
  4. Kodzi installs this zip file on your behalf, and then you can use the addon or repository like you normally

Kodzi Kodi addon Main Menu

item.title: How To Install The Crew Addon Kodi 2024
item.description:
What is Crew Addon?

The Crew Kodi addon lets you stream movies on demand, TV shows, IPTV, sports, programming for children, and much more. It is one of the most loved addons.

The Crew addon offers a variety of content categories, including a large collection of films and TV shows. It can fetch free links but is most effective when used with Real Debrid and other premium hosts. The addon can be integrated into Trakt to stream your activities across devices and other applications.

To help with these and other reasons, The Crew is part of our list of Top Kodi Extensions.

Check out our tutorial below to learn how to set up The Crew Kodi extension step-by-step in only two minutes.

Attention: Protect Your Privacy Online

Be aware that streaming videos may be prohibited in your specific country. Online privacy protection is becoming more essential. We suggest using the use of a VPN. A VPN safeguards your online activity and prevents your service provider and other authorities from scrutinizing your online activities.

Through the use of a VPN, you can also alter your address so that you can gain access to services not available at the place you reside.

We suggest using the most reliable Kodi VPN for 2024.

  • ProtonVPN: The most efficient way to increase your speed.
  • Access VPN for Privacy Access VPN: The best choice for those with a tight budget.
  • Surfshark VPN: Great for usability.
  • NordVPN: Best for average speeds.
  • CyberGhost VPN is the best VPN for a long trial period.

Koditricks.com is not associated with the creators of Kodi addons. We have no control over the contents of Kodi addons, nor do we recommend that our users take action against copyright violations.

Sections Overview:

  • Movies
  • TV Shows
  • Sports
    • NFL
    • NHL
    • NBA
    • MLB
    • NCAAF
    • NCAAB
    • UFC / MMA
    • WWE
    • Boxing
    • …and more!
  • IPTV
  • Kids
  • 1 Clicks
  • CC Collections
  • Stand Up Comedy
  • Tools
  • Search

How to install the Crew Kodi Addon

Install The Crew Repository

  1. You might need to allow unidentified sources within your Kodi settings.
  2. You can go into Your Kodi settings and then open the file manager.
  3. Choose (Add source) & click on “None.”
  4. in the path, type “https://team-crew.github.io/" and select “Done”
  5. Click on the box to highlight it and enter an appropriate name, such as “the_crew” for this media source
  6. Click “OK”
  7. Return to the main menu and click “Addons” on the left.
  8. You can open the addon browser by clicking the small box symbol on the upper left
  9. Choose “Install from a ZIP file.”
  10. Refuse to ignore the warning message “Yes.”
  11. Open on source “the_crew” and select the file “repository.thecrew-x.x.zip”
  12. It would help if you waited until you saw a notification that the repository was installed.

If you’re unsure how to install the Kodi addon, our guide, which includes pictures, can help.

Install The Crew Kodi Addon

  1. In the addon browser, select “Install from repository.”
  2. Choose the one that is the option to install “The Crew Repo.”
  3. Select the tab “Video addons.”
  4. Choose The Crew and click on “Install” on the bottom right
  5. Verify the installation of dependencies by clicking “OK.”
  6. It would help if you waited until you saw a notification that indicates the Kodi addon has been installed successfully.
  7. Return to the main menu, and the Kodi addon will be available.

The Crew ScreenShots:

  • The Crew Kodi Addon Main Menu
  • Movies Section
  • Sports Section

How do I unlock the Adult Section?

  1. Launch the Crew Kodi Addon
  2. Scroll to the bottom and click “Tools.”
  3. Select “Settings: Navigation”
  4. Choose “Adult Play Ground” and enter your password “lol” (without quotation marks)
  5. Revert to The Crew’s main menu in The Crew, and a new section will be created.

How can I solve the problem of the Crew not working with Kodi for Windows?

It is possible that the Crew Kodi Addon does not work on Kodi on Windows and closes by displaying an error. For other platforms, the addon functions without issues.

The reason is that Windows’ integrated security against viruses does not correctly identify a related file as malicious and remove it.

When you open Windows Security in the settings and click “Virus & threat protection,” you can see that a file has been classified as “Trojan: Python/MCCrash.B!MTB.”

Use these suggestions to fix the issue:

  • On Windows, look up “Windows Security” and click on the result at the top.
  • Select “Virus & threat protection.”
  • In"Current Threats,” select the “Current threats” section, and choose “Protection history.”
  • Look for a blocked file detected as “Trojan: Python/MCCrash.B!MTB.”
  • Select “Actions” and unblock the file.

Important: Before unblocking any file, ensure the timestamp you use is correct. Don’t block files that aren’t compatible with Kodi or specific addons. If you’re in doubt, don’t take any action in any way.

FAQ’s

What are the risks associated with The Crew addon?

The Crew addon is secure if the application is being used to stream content that is copyright-free and available within the open domain. If you watch copyrighted content, you could have legal issues. Use ExpressVPN to stay clear of legal issues.

Where can I download The Crew addon on FireStick?

The Crew addon is installed via the official source on FireStick. To install it, follow the steps in this article.

What are the channels you can watch through the Crew Kodi addon?

The Crew is a versatile addon that lets you view movies, shows, live TV, sports, and more.

Last Words

  • The Crew Kodi addon is ideal for streaming various media, such as films, shows, live TV, movies, and more. The addon’s scrapers pull content from multiple sources. It also allows Real-Debrid sign-in and greater resolution of 1080p and 4K streams.
